scripts.drop-db: export PGPASSWORD='password'; psql -U root -h recommender_spike_db -d postgres -c "DROP DATABASE recommender_spike WITH (FORCE);" && exit 0
scripts.create-db: export PGPASSWORD='password'; psql -U root -h recommender_spike_db -d postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE recommender_spike;"  && exit 0
scripts.apply-schema-and-data-and-changes: export PGPASSWORD='password'; psql -U root -h recommender_spike_db -d recommender_spike -f db/001.schema.sql -f db/002.adding-products.sql -f db/003.adding-embeddings.sql -f db/004.adding-users.sql -f db/005.adding-orders.sql -f db/006.adding-products.sql -f db/007.adding-embeddings.sql && exit 0
scripts.rebuild-db: npm run drop-db && npm run create-db && npm run apply-schema-and-data-and-changes
